SELECT

SELECT
FROM tbl_product p WHERE p.product_orderable = 'Y' AND p.category_code = ( CASE #{category} WHEN 'food' THEN 1 WHEN 'dessert' THEN 2 WHEN 'drink' THEN 3 END )

SELECT
FROM tbl_product p WHERE p.product_code = #{productCode} AND p.product_orderable = 'Y'
SELECT category_code, category_name FROM tbl_category ORDER BY category_code

SELECT
FROM tbl_product p
p.product_orderable = 'Y'
AND ( p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.product_description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY p.product_code DESC

SELECT
